comment.author: 21001715@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Standing portraits, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Mrs. Owens and Mrs' Moore were participants in the Suffrage Pageant held in Washington D.C. in 1913. The costumes they are wearing in this photo are from that event. A small photo of them in the same outfits appears in an article about the pageant, published in a 1913 issue of "National Waterways" magazine. See my comment on this page for more information about it.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Dominique Sanchez: We received your request to have a Library of Congress photo added to your group: Standing Portraits. Please click on the "Invite this photo to..." link below the comment box and we'll accept it.
